CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains task then leaves the room
MOT and CHI are in room with several toys on floor
MOT kneels on floor next to toys
MOT leans towards CHI and looks into his face
CHI stands facing MOT and toys
MOT picks up toy car and holds it out to CHI
MOT still holds car in front of CHI
CHI turns away from MOT and looks around room
<aft> MOT leans back looking at CHI
CHI turns then looks at MOT
CHI continues to watch MOT with his back to the camera
MOT points to the toy car
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and sets it in front of her
MOT looks at the jack+in+the+box then back at CHI
MOT looks at CHI then down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI stands in front of MOT looking down
CHI back is to the camera
MOT pushes clown down in to box
MOT moves towards CHI on her knees . <aft> MOT reaches for the bottle that hangs out of CHI mouth
CHI looks at MOT then begins to move to one side
MOT sits down on rug looking at CHI
MOT taps on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI walks to jack+in+the+box and squats down beside it and holds on to the box
CHI turns handle on jack+in+the+box then stops
CHI turns handle on jack+in+the+box again
CHI stops turning handle then pats top of jack+in+the+box
MOT taps handle of jack+in+the+box with index finger
CHI turns handle of jack+in+the+box again then stops
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns handle of jack+in+the+box again
CHI stands up then picks up football
<bef> MOT reaches hand out for ball then withdraws her hand
MOT tosses ball up and catches it
<$=1> <bef> MOT tosses ball and catches it
CHI watches MOT with his back to the camera
MOT holds ball out towards CHI
CHI squats by jack+in+the+box and turns the handle
MOT sets football down on rug
CHI stops turning the handle and presses on top of jack+in+the+box then turns the handle again
CHI stops turning handle of jack+in+the+box and grabs football
<aft> CHI tries to pick up football
MOT rolls ball back towards CHI
CHI sits down and tries to grab football again
CHI still tries to pick up football
MOT pushes football closer to CHI
MOT picks up ball and rolls it back to CHI
CHI stands up then squats back down to grab his bottle and stands up again
CHI walks over to chair and climbs up on it
CHI walks around with the bottle hanging out of his mouth
MOT tucks CHIs shirt into his pants
CHI holds bottle out in front of MOTs face
MOT still trying to tuck in CHIs shirt
MOT still tucking in CHIs shirt

MOT tucks in CHIs shirt then picks up bottle and sets it on table
<aft> MOT sits back and looks at CHI
CHI looks around room then back at jack+in+the+box
CHI stands up and picks the jack+in+the+box up by the head
MOT sets jack+in+the+box back on rug
CHI squats next to jack+in+the+box and pushes clown down in jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes clown down into jack+in+the+box

MOT shuts lid of jack+in+the+box again and turns handle a couple of times
CHI turns handle on jack+in+the+box then stops
CHI turns handle on jack+in+the+box more

CHI looks past table off screen
CHI looks off to one side

CHI taps on lid of jack+in+the+box
CHI continues to tap on lid
CHI stops turning handle of jack+in+the+box

MOT looks up where CHI was pointing
MOT looks up at the ceiling
CHI stands up and looks at wall
MOT glances where CHI is looking then back at CHI
MOT glances at mirror then at CHI
CHI looks at wall off screen
MOT smoothes CHIs hair with her hand
MOT picks at CHIs hair then stops
<bef> CHI stoops and picks up toy car then holds it out towards MOT
MOT nods head and smiles at CHI
CHI holds car in both hands and looks at it
CHI continues to look at car
CHI squats and rolls car on rug
CHI continues to roll car on rug
MOT picks up rubber duck and squeaks it at CHI
CHI stands up holding car and looks at duck
CHI looks away from MOT at wall
MOT squeaks duck at CHI again
CHI looks back at MOT while holding the car in one hand
CHI walks over to MOT and feels duck while holding the car in his other hand
MOT drops the duck on the rug
MOT leafs through pages of book then shuts it again

CHI squeaks the duck several times
CHI bends down reaching for the book
CHI attempts to open the book
CHI back is to the camera

MOT puts hand on CHIs stomach and pulls him back

MOT takes hand away from wall outlet
